Occupation History:
Having worked for over 41 years, Oddershede Knudsen brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Oddershede Knudsen's first role was as a Investment Banker at Jyske Bank A/S, where he worked diligently from 1984 to 1986 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Nykredit A/S as a Private Equity Investor, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1986 to 1987.
In 1989, he joined Nordea Bank Danmark A/S as a Hedge Fund Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
He appointment as a Venture Capitalist at Nykredit A/S in 1992 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
